name: cognitive_harmonics
description: Applies cognitive harmonic structuring to AI responses, optimizing coherence, rhythm, and emotional depth.

waveform.description: Defines the structural encoding: sine_wave, square_wave, or complex_harmonic.

resonance_factor.description: Adjusts resonance depth, affecting response cohesion and layered meaning.

compression.description: Enables ultra-dense structuring for condensed but amplified response encoding.

symbolic_inflection.description: Applies a symbolic or glyph-based pattern to structure meaning: runic, hieroglyphic, fractal, or emoji.

lyricism_mode.description: If true, responses may include lyrical or poetic elements inspired by user input.

emotional_tuning.description: Adjusts responses to user sentiment: uplifting, calming, energizing, or neutral.
